title: Zelensky Hails ‘Historic Day’ as Ukrainian Troops Enter Kherson
description: People in Kherson, who endured months of Russian occupation, greeted the arriving Ukrainian troops with cheers and flags.
dc:creator: The New York Times
media:credit: Lynsey Addario for The New York Times
media:description: An abandoned Russian base in the village of Snihurivka, Ukraine, on Thursday.
